snippet: The Treasury Department said the April budget surplus was $156.7 billion, up from $106.9 billion a year earlier, the largest surplus since April 2008.
abstract: Treasury Department reports April budget surplus of $156.7 billion, up from $106.9 billion in year-earlier period; surplus is the largest since April 2008.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said the April budget surplus was $156.7 billion, up from $106.9 billion a year earlier, the largest surplus since April 2008.

headline.main: $157 Billion Budget Surplus in April, Treasury Reports
headline.print_headline: $157 Billion Budget Surplus in April, Treasury Reports
